question.text:
Match the following:
 
a  Pure nitrogen i  Chlorine
b Haber process ii Sulphuric acid
c  Contact process iii Ammonia
d  Deacon’s process iv Sodium azide or Barium azide

Which of the following is the correct option?

options.text: <math><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mo>-</mo><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi></mrow></mfenced><mo>;</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">b</mi><mo>-</mo><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi></mrow></mfenced><mo>;</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mo>-</mo><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi></mrow></mfenced><mo>;</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi><mo>-</mo><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">v</mi></mrow></mfenced></math>

<math><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mo>-</mo><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi></mrow></mfenced><mo>;</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">b</mi><mo>-</mo><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">v</mi></mrow></mfenced><mo>;</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mo>-</mo><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi></mrow></mfenced><mo>;</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi><mo>-</mo><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi></mrow></mfenced></math>

<math><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mo>-</mo><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi></mrow></mfenced><mo>;</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">b</mi><mo>-</mo><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">v</mi></mrow></mfenced><mo>;</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mo>-</mo><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi></mrow></mfenced><mo>;</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi><mo>-</mo><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi></mrow></mfenced></math>

<math><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mo>-</mo><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">v</mi></mrow></mfenced><mo>;</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">b</mi><mo>-</mo><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi></mrow></mfenced><mo>;</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mo>-</mo><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi></mrow></mfenced><mo>;</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi><mo>-</mo><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi></mrow></mfenced></math>

solution.text:
Haber's process is the industrial process for production of ammonia.

Contact process is the industrial process for production of sulphuric acid.

Pure nitrogen is prepared from sodium azide.

Deacon's process is the commercial preparation of chlorine.
